programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Alkaa uustintana. Karhun pelastus. Dokumentaarinen sarja seuraa Animal Services Department -yksikon tyota Miamissa. Villielainagentit pyydetaan pelastamaan auton alle jaanytta mustakarhua. Tutkijat kuulustelevat laittoman sianteurastusoperaation omistajaa.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 4/6. Koskettavassa sarjassa ihmiset tekevat kaikkensa, jotta pystyat auttamaan apua tarvitsevia elaimia ympari maailmaa. (Dodo Heroes, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kalamies ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade etsii Italian Garda-jarvelta 1500-luvun hirviokalaa. Millaisia salaisuuksia jarven pinnan alle katkeytyy?

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: UUSI SARJA! Kausi 1, osa 1. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Houstonin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Kausi 17, osa 9. Dokumentaarisessa sarjassa seurataan Houstonin elainsuojeluyhdistyksen tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elainten hyvaksi. (Animal Cops Houston, tosi-tv, USA, 2010)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Alkaa uusintana. Dokumentaarinen sarja seuraa Pennsylvaniassa toimivan SPCA´s Humane Law Enforcementin tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elaimien hyvaksi.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Asiantuntijat puivat isojalkaan eli maailman tunnetuimpaan mystiseen olioon liittyvia teorioita. Uudet todisteet kertovat, etta se voi olla paljon hurjempi otus kuin on uskottu.

programme.title: Pandamonium
programme.desc: Seuraa jattilaispanda Mao Maon raskautta aina dramaattiseen peratilasynnytykseen. Wolongin suojelu- ja tutkimuskeskus yrittaa elvyttaa vastasyntynytta.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Marty aloittaa myrskyn jalkeen kunnianhimoisen, palveluverkon ulkopuolisen vesivoimalan rakentamisen. Matt rakentaa lihapalvaamon, ja arvaamaton onnettomuus aiheuttaa vamman.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Ryhma uhkaa huonoa saata kiivetessaan toiseen leiriin. Bricen on paatettava, kuka saa osallistua viimeiseen koitokseen.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Olosuhteisiin sopeutunut tiimi jattaa base campin ja suuntaa huipulle. Matkan lyhyydesta huolimatta Davidilla ja Phurballa on pitka matka kuljettavana tavoitteiden saavuttamiseksi.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Matka maailman ympari nayttaa, miten koirasta tuli maailman arvostetuimpiin elaimiin kuuluva laji. Ihmisen parhaan ystavan tarina kulkee villipedosta lempeaksi lemmikiksi.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tiimi hoitaa hylattyja kissoja. Elainlaakari Jeff valaa uskoa huolestuneeseen omistajaan, jonka koiralla on todettu syopa. Pelastettu tiikeri rakastuu.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Craig OConnell ja Andy Casagrande seilaavat Serenajokea ylavirtaan ja yrittavat selvittaa, miksi nuoret harkahait uivat joelle, ja miten ne valttavat siella elavat krokotiilit.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Salainen operaatio. Tiimi auttaa takapihalle pakkaseen jatettya koiraa seka jateviemariin juuttunutta kissaa. (Animal Cops Philadelphia, tosi-tv, USA, 2008)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Dokumentaarinen sarja seuraa Pennsylvaniassa toimivan SPCA´s Humane Law Enforcementin tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elaimien hyvaksi.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Marty avustaa tilallisia Oregonissa rakentamaan ladon. Misty rakentaa ensimmaisen maanalaisen puutarhansa. Matt loytaa inhimillisen torjuntakeinon salaperaista petoa vastaan.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Elaimet pystyvat ihmeellisiin tekoihin, ja osalla niista on supervoimia, josta ihmiset voivat vain uneksia. Uusi tiede ja hienot esitykset paljastavat salaisuuksia elainmaailmasta.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Elaimet tekevat uskomattomia asioita, mutta oletko koskaan pohtinut miten tai miksi? Sarjassa vastatataan kiehtovimpiin elainaiheisiin kysymyksiin.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Kun valvontakamera nappaa kuvan kissaa hakkaavasta miehesta, tutkijoiden on saatava hanet kiinni. Laiminlyodyt koirat ovat kuoleman partaalla ja pollot pelastetaan purkualueelta.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Nichols hoitaa naapurin koiran kanssa tappelussa loukkaantunutta kissaa. Neljasluokkalaisten kaikki toivo on Jeffissa, etta tama pystyisi pelastamaan lemmikkisiilin.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy auttaa yhta Los Angelesin palomiesta, kun tama ei pysty kasittelemaan hullua kissaansa Cocoa. Foley kauhistuttaa teksasilaista pariskuntaa oisilla pelotteluilla.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Matka maailman ympari nayttaa, miten koirasta tuli maailman arvostetuimpiin elaimiin kuuluva laji. Ihmisen parhaan ystavan tarina kulkee villipedosta lempeaksi lemmikiksi.

programme.desc: Tiimi hoitaa hylattyja kissoja. Elainlaakari Jeff valaa uskoa huolestuneeseen omistajaan, jonka koiralla on todettu syopa. Pelastettu tiikeri rakastuu.

programme.title: Pandamonium
programme.desc: Kaksosia odottava Ju Ju on hyva esimerkki jattilaispandojen keinotekoiseen kasvatukseen liittyvista ongelmista. Selviavatko molemmat pennut 12 tunnin kivuliaan synnytyksen jalkeen?

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa seurataan alansa parhaita ja alykkaimpia tutkijoita, insinooreja, yrittajia ja keksijoita, jotka tekevat uraauurtavaa tyota etsiessaan seuraavia mullistavia keksintoja.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown elavat seitseman lapsensa kanssa omavaraistaloudessa, missa olemassaolo riippuu hyvasta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Inspiroivia tarinoita avuntarpeessa olevista elamista seka niita voimiaan saastelematta auttavista ihmisista ympari maailmaa.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kalastaja ja tutkimusretkeilija Jeremy Wade etsii Australiasta makeanveden petokalaa, jonka uskotaan kuolleen sukupuuttoon. Mutta mita han loytaakaan?

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kalastaja ja tutkimusretkeilija Jeremy Wade on ammattikalastajien aluksella Alaskassa etsimassa ruijanpallasta. Nakyyko 25-kiloisesta jatista jalkeakaan?

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Kiipeajat jatkavat uuvuttavaa matkaansa kohti Everestin huippua. Tim jaa kuitenkin jalkeen, ja Russel uhkaa heittaa hanet ulos. David suorittaa ensimmaisen traversen.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Huonot paatokset vainoavat ykkosryhman jasenia heidan saavuttaessaan neljannen leirin kuolemanvyohykkeella. Hapenpuute saa aikaan fyysisia vaikeuksia.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Matka maailman ympari nayttaa, miten koirasta tuli maailman arvostetuimpiin elaimiin kuuluva laji. Ihmisen parhaan ystavan tarina kulkee villipedosta lempeaksi lemmikiksi.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 5, osa 7. Denverin periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Elamaa Tsernobylin jalkeen
programme.desc: Ensimmaisena tayden paasyn Tšernobylin vaara-alueelle saaneet tiedemiehet tutkivat, miten 30 vuoden takainen onnettomuus on vaikuttanut maailman saastuneimman ympariston elamaan.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 4. Zeusin taistelu eloonjaamisesta. Laakintatiimi tyoskentelee yon yli yrittaen pelastaa saksanpaimenkoiran, jolla on elainsuojaan saapuessaan syvalle hiertynyt kaulus. (Animal Cops Philadelphia, tosi-tv, USA, 2008)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Tiimi pelastaa lampohalvauksesta karsivan koiran. Elainsuojeluyhdistyksen poliisit tutkivat ilmoitusta veitsella koiraa vastaan tehdysta hyokkayksesta.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Lahestyva metsapalo pakottaa Stuart ja Toni Rinkerin pohtimaan ratkaisua huonosti menestyvalle omavaraistilalleen. Stuart kuitenkin vastustaa Raneyn palontorjuntaehdotusta.

programme.title: Wild Costa Rica
programme.desc: Costa Rica kuuluu maailman ekologisesti monimuotoisimpiin alueisiin ja siella asustaa mita ihmeellisempia otuksia, kuten harvinainen ja salaperainen oselotti, puuma ja moni muu.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Miamin hylatyt. Miamin elainpoliisit kokevat tehtavan itselleen erityisen laheiseksi, kun he loytavat kaksi jo adoptoitua koiraa kadulta avun tarpeessa.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kun vastaanotolle saapuu suustaan vaahtoava koira, taytyy elainlaakari Jeffin toimia nopeasti. Penelope-possu tarvitsee leikkauksen, jota Jeff ole koskaan aiemmin tehnyt.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Whisky tekee tarpeensa minne tahansa: paivallispoydalle, sohvalle ja jopa Katen ja Cameronin paalle. Pystyyko Jackson opettamaan sen hyville tavoille?

programme.title: Pandamonium
programme.desc: Kaikki jattilaispandat kuuluvat Kiinalle synnyinpaikasta riippumatta. San Diegossa syntynyt Mei Sheng lahtee Wolongiin - luonnolliseen kotimaahan, jota se ei ole koskaan nahnyt.

programme.title: Adrift: 47 Days with Sharks
programme.desc: Toisen maailmansodan lentajat Louis Zamperini ja Russell Phillips selviytyivat 47 paivaa haita kuhisevilla vesilla heidan koneensa pudottua Tyyneen Valtamereen.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Ystavykset matkaavat syvalle Sambiaan tiikerikalasta tehtyjen havaintoja seuraten. Edessa on liki 650 kilometria soratieta, krokotiileja, virtahepoja ja pulaa polttoaineesta.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 6. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 3. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 4. Zeusin taistelu eloonjaamisesta. Laakintatiimi tyoskentelee yon yli yrittaen pelastaa saksanpaimenkoiran, jolla on elainsuojaan saapuessaan syvalle hiertynyt kaulus. (Animal Cops Philadelphia, tosi-tv, USA, 2008)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Tiimi pelastaa lampohalvauksesta karsivan koiran. Elainsuojeluyhdistyksen poliisit tutkivat ilmoitusta veitsella koiraa vastaan tehdysta hyokkayksesta.

programme.title: New York: Americas Busiest City
programme.desc: Anita Rani, Ade Adepitan and Ant Anstead join 5.5 million commuters on the iconic Staten Island ferry, the subway and citibikes to find out about commuting in New York. 1/3

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben returns to a remote Australian island to find out how former businessman David Glasheen is getting on. For more than twenty years David enjoyed a life of peace but must survive by growing his own vegetables.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Its winter, which means its trapping season. Ricko finds the remnants of a wolf attack. In Bethel, Avery and his brother Gage head out to source fox fur.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben heads to northern England and stays with host Paul in Lincolnshire onboard his 30-year-old converted military truck. He discovers why Paul traded living in a house for life on the road.

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: Following early Homo sapiens ancestors as they step out of Africa and venture into the wider world, heading into areas inhabited by other human species. 2/5

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: The ravages of flood waters can render any location instantly unrecognisable. Whether dry land becomes a river, or a river becomes a nightmare, raging floods let nothing get in their way. Floods are the most common and widespread of all weather-related natural disasters.

programme.title: New York: Americas Busiest City
programme.desc: Anita Rani, Ade Adepitan and Ant Anstead join 5.5 million commuters on the iconic Staten Island ferry, the subway and citibikes to find out about commuting in New York. 1/3

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Return of the travel series narrated by Bill Nighy, beginning with a trip from the Kyle of Lochalsh, a tiny fishing village on the far west coast of Scotland. The jounrney heads east across the Highlands, then turns south through the whisky country of Speyside to Aberdeen, Scotlands oil capital.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to Sweden to meet Annalisa, the Italian chose a life on the streets of Europe as a teenager, and now is developing a forest hideaway on the fringes of Swedish society for her and her toddler.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans contend with the throes of the warm season.

programme.title: Pompeiis Secret Underworld
programme.desc: Once thought of as a symbol of Roman sophistication, recent archaeological discoveries at Pompeii uncover a complex and dark reality that was key to the city functioning.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey find out how this great British treat is made in a factory that produces 432 million of them every year!

programme.title: Einstein and Hawking: Unlocking the Universe
programme.desc: Documentary on British theoretical physicist Stephen Hawking; his childhood, education, marriage, family life, and his work on the Big Bang and black holes.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: The very heart of Africa is covered in dense tropical rainforest. The animals that live here find the most ingenious ways to carve out their space in a claustrophobic landscape. Danger lurks in every shadow, but some animals thrive here, from honey-stealing chimps to birds with a lineage as old as the dinosaurs, thundering elephants and kick-boxing frogs.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Pulled by a gleaming Siemens Charger locomotive, our double-decked coaches will take us on a 350-mile trip into the Californian dream. On our way well stop off in Carlsbad.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans harness the power of the sun as they toil through summer.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Native Glaswegian Susan rejected retirement for a remote region of Africa, where she has set up both a school and a mountain-top restaurant.

programme.title: Pompeiis Secret Underworld
programme.desc: Explore the impact of Pompeiis deeply divided society, the mechanisms used to maintain social order, and what society was like in the years leading up to Pompeiis destruction by Vesuvius.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo has a modern edition of his Bradshaws Continental Handbook, dated 1936. His destination lies close to his heart: the ancient kingdom of Spain and land of his father.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: In Kavik, Sue looks for rabbits before the sun sets for the long dark winter. Johnny, traps with a rabbit hide. Avery and his brother Gage, experience a white-out.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben stays with Naveen and Anke who have made their home in the Sri Lankas highlands. He uncovers why they swapped one of the biggest cities in the world for a simple off-grid existence miles from civilisation.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Beginning in historic Orleans, Michael follows his Bradshaws guide to the magnificent stained-glass windows of the Cathedral of Sainte-Croix, which tell the story of Joan of Arc.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Old friends and fellow comedians Johnny Vegas and Lucy Beaumont take on perilous mountain drops and sheer cliff edges, on a hair-raising trip down some of Montenegros most terrifying roads.

programme.title: Changing Planet
programme.desc: In the second year of a seven-year project, six presenters chart the fight to save the planets endangered ecosystems. In this episode, we visit the Maldives, USA and Greenland.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben heads back to Utah, where he first met twin brothers Bill and Bob Stone, 3 years ago. He re-joins these canyon-dwelling renegades in their remote home, but this time, only one of them is living there.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: In Kavik, Sue looks for rabbits before the sun sets for the long dark winter. Johnny, traps with a rabbit hide. Avery and his brother Gage, experience a white-out.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada
programme.desc: Pilot of Life Below Zero: Canada. Meet the cast as they face daily challenges to survive in sub-zero temperatures, often in isolation. Can they make a success of their environment and thrive?

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Pulled by a gleaming Siemens Charger locomotive, our double-decked coaches will take us on a 350-mile trip into the Californian dream. On our way well stop off in Carlsbad.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Native Glaswegian Susan rejected retirement for a remote region of Africa, where she has set up both a school and a mountain-top restaurant.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans harness the power of the sun as they toil through summer.

programme.title: Pompeiis Secret Underworld
programme.desc: Explore the impact of Pompeiis deeply divided society, the mechanisms used to maintain social order, and what society was like in the years leading up to Pompeiis destruction by Vesuvius.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a Yorkshire team that churn out up to 90,000 vegan sausages a day! Historian Ruth Goodman uncovers the green shoots of the vegetarian movement in Britain.

programme.title: Horizon: Pluto - Back From The Dead
programme.desc: The incredible story of Pluto. Featuring first-hand accounts of the incredible discoveries made by New Horizons from many of the scientists involved in the mission.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Southern Africa is a riot of life and colour because of two great ocean currents that sweep around the continents Cape. To the east, the warm Agulhas current generates clouds that roll inland to the wettest place in southern Africa. To the west is the cold Benguela current, home to more great white sharks than anywhere else. Moisture laden fog rolls inland, supporting an incredible desert garden.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: A trip through the Peak District at full steam, pulled by the Royal Scot, one of the finest locomotives ever built. On the way from Crewe to York, the train travels over Chat Moss on a line built by Robert Stephenson.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans must capitalize on the resources of the Arctic Summer.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets Jaimie, an eccentric inventor originally from Vermont who lives with his family on a group of islands he has bought off the coast of Panama. 7/12

programme.title: Tutankhamun with Dan Snow
programme.desc: We reveal the new science shedding light on the secrets of Tutankhamuns burial, use the latest technology to investigate what could have killed him and get a taste of the Pharaohs life of pampered luxury.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins
programme.desc: Sue Perkins starts her journey in Tokyo, home to 36 million people. She trains with a female sumo wrestling team and meets a family who live with robots.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Chip Hailstone, struggles to hunt in high winds. Avery and Gage drill for black fish. In Shageluk, Sonta and her children look for rabbit tracks.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets a former carpenter who now lives alone on a private island in the Icelandic wilderness. He discusses how a struggle with alcoholism drove him to turn his back on life in the big city, and enlists Bens aid in fishing and harvesting, as well as maintaining his yurt business. They also go swimming in the freezing waters and take a trek up the countrys most famous volcano - and discover how the island could be under threat from Icelands volatile environment.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins
programme.desc: Sue Perkins enjoys a night out with Kyotos geishas, goes free diving with some ama divers and visits Hiroshima. In Tokyo, she explores how the Japanese are tackling the future.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: A maverick fishing crew take on ten adrenaline-filled fishing trips around the world. Their first stop is Kenya.

programme.title: Julius Caesar: The Making of a Dictator
programme.desc: The rise to power of the Roman leader, telling the dramatic story of how nearly five centuries of democracy was overthrown in just 16 years, beginning as he sought to become consul, the highest political position in Rome. To do so, he entered into dangerous alliances and bent the rules of the republic, courting the popular vote, exploiting division and using bribery and intimidation to get his own way.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben returns to the remote Hungarian countryside to revisit Julia Pryke and Gareth Shone who just 16 months ago gave up the 9 - 5 in the UK to live in a ramshackle farmhouse in a country they had never visited.

programme.title: QI

programme.desc: 6/7. Elainten on selviydyttava myos aariolosuhteissa kuten syvassa ja pimeassa luolassa tai pohjoisnavalla. Myos myrskyjen, maastopalojen ja kuivuuden kanssa on opittava elamaan. Planeettamme Maa III tarjoaa odotetun jatkon kahdelle edelliselle samannimiselle huippusarjalle. programme.desc: Mush-Mush is very proud he invented a new game called Fruity Bounce, where he and his friends bounce as high as possible on the bouncier fruits they can find.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush discovers that Morel is afraid of the dark, he suggests that Chep, Lilit and he take the Mushlets to their first overnight forest camp

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are always up to new adventures, Bolly has dubbed them The Adventurers. Flattered, our friends invite Bolly to choose his challenge to become an Adventurer too. Bolly will have to be the first Mushable to set foot somewhere. Mushton being crowded, Mush-Mush suggests they find an island, somewhere on the giant lake…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Truff is happy. He has found a necklace that makes him even Truffier! Except he had no idea the necklace belongs to Starmush. And the Mushelder promised there will be consequences for whoever took it. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit now have to save Truff from being consequenced…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is under pressure. Truff, the most talented musician in Mushton, has invited her, Mush-Mush and Chep to form a band with him. Only problem is they can hardly play music! Truff insists: they just need to relax and feel the groove. But when Truff tells his new band they will perform at the Food Snail, Lilit isn’t relaxed at all!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell. But since the object was found in the trash, he needs to wash it first. And the Lemmings are using the sole bar of soap in the house as a bobsleigh.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange American Indian figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou. He immediately tries to activate the reverse procedure, but the Lemmings steal the figurine in order to turn into a partridge and fly away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. Instead of showing the reflection of the person who holds it, the mirror shows an idealized vision of his surroundings. Whether it be Grizzy or the Lemmings, everyone sees the world of his dreams, and no one wants to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan, the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. Grizzy is sure that a stick like that would save him a lot of work, the only problem is how to get it from the Lemmings, who have become sorcerers apprentices?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Whilst trying to stop the Lemmings from playing with a crate of firework rockets Grizzy is literally carried away with them when the largest specimen shoots off

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share, Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. Amidst the debris, they discover a strange pack: an army tent with all the necessary equipment to recreate a "home" in nature. Its the chance to discover the joys of camping in the wild.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it. They spray a bit of the water of youth onto Grizzy and he instantly turns into a harmless cub they can easily rid themselves of. But the effects of the waters are only temporary.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: At a funfair, Mr Bean wins a balloon for Teddy and ties it to him while he plays on the hook a duck. But he’s so engrossed he doesn’t notice his companion floating away! Soon Mr Bean is chasing Teddy as he glides and snags on various fairground rides. Will Mr Bean rescue Teddy before he floats away forever?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock – Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage. / Mr Bean goes to buy the biggest TV in the world only to find that it has a price- tag to match.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece –featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wicket’s pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbour’s house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes ‘man overboard’ and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To Truff, making music comes effortlessly. So when he needs to put in a big effort to make a ‘forest song’, it affects him in unusual ways.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves Chanterelles art so much. But when Chanterelle makes a statue of Lilit, she cant stand it. Does Lilit tell the truth or does she just carry on pretending to like it?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers learn that Mushpie absolutely cannot resist an adorable look. And now everyone is using their adorable power to get Mushpie to do what they want!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle absolutely loves everything about bark-boarding ... until she tries it!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone thinks that Puff has done what no Mushable has ever done before -- touched Muddlers mud pile. But has he really?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create an irresistible rhythm on a set of magic drums and kick off a battle of the bands with Grizzy, who just wants a good nights sleep.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her...Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin. The rodents land in the neighboring hut of a sorcerer and a mysterious mask falls onto one of them, endowing him with the power of telekinesis. The Lemmings are thrilled! They return to the cabin to explore this new magic power. Perched upon pieces of furniture, they fly around the room to finish their life-size flying train game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang enters the heart of the American Gothic South in order to help an attractive farmer who Fred wants to impress with his mystery-solving prowess. A horrifying Scarecrow has come to life and attempts to drive everyone off his farm.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang is honored to take part in the wedding of two close friends. But can Best Man Shaggy and Maid of Honor Daphne save their friend’s perfect day before it’s ruined by a tragic Ghost Bride bent on destroying everyone else’s happily ever after?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff makes a wish on a magic artifact for the other Batwheels to be turned into monster trucks, just like him! The rest of the Batwheels must learn how to use their big new bodies to undo the wish!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi just can’t put down her new exciting video game, even when MOE needs her help packing Bam’s utility belt for a mission. / Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When a day of fun with Nonna prompts Vivie to realize Nonnas declining mobility, Nonna and Barney help Vivie discover how she can care for Nonna by making simple adjustments that allow them to keep having fun in a slightly different way.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Baby Bops playful teasing bothers Mel, Barney helps motivate Mel to speak up for herself. / Mel is frustrated at how long her broken arm is taking to heal, so Barney helps her understand that some things take time.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean’s heart-throb Roxy is singing at the Palladium. With her record, poster, and T-shirt ready, he’s determined to get her autograph no matter what.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean discovers he has a doppelganger: Mr. Pod. They wear the same clothes and look exactly alike. Unfortunately, it all goes wrong when his girlfriend, Irma, thinks that Mr. Pod is much more handsome than Bean.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece –featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbour’s house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes ‘man overboard’ and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of… doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n’ span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, it’s chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! Mission accomplished…and now they have nothing to do. Every other job to catch lab experiments gone rogue is a piece of cake compared to Lamput. Realizing that they’ve lost their lives’ purpose, Specs and Skinny decide to break Lamput out of the lab’s hi-tech prison so that they can go back to catching him again.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Night has fallen and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. He sees the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work, and tries to distract the Lemmings and capture the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings don’t miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tuffy shows an interest in soccer, Jerry decides to be the little guys coach and show him how the game is really played by beating Tom in a one-on-one match.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is placed in charge of the preparations for the Duchesss surprise birthday party for her nephew, Rupert, and Jerry is determined to make a mess of it all.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tyke is accidentally carried off to the local dump Spike is forced to enlist the help of Jerry and Tom to get his boy back before he is turned into a formidable junkyard pup.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An over protected Spike goes to extreme lengths to keep his precious pup safe from harm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry work together to save a live turkey from becoming the centerpiece of a holiday feast.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the Joker floods the Batcave, the Batwheels evacuate and relocate to a nearby parking garage. As they adapt to their temporary home, they learn important lessons about family and making the most of what you have.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batman refuses to engage Joker in a race, Prank goads Bam into a rematch. Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares and take the high road?

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about trying new things.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred and the gang are called in to help with a mystery involving a figure from Freds past, Professor Huh? Fred discovers Rose, with whom he learned mystery solving until they had a falling out, has also arrived with her gang.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred and the gang are called in to help with a mystery involving a figure from Freds past Professor Huh? Fred discovers Rose his old childhood friend with whom he learned mystery solving until they had a falling out has also arrived with her gang. The race to see which gang could solve the mystery first is on as the rest of the gang learns theres more to this story than meets the eye and Freds interest in finding Professor Huh? is as personal as it gets.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but it’s too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop… until he’s thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book – so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddy’s picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines – and soon enough, he’s been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like he’s cheating!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet – but it won’t appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but it’s useless – he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm – yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesn’t miss the comet…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctor’s outfit with stethoscope – great Teddy - I’ll give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking he’s a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before he’s found out?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride – but the security guard makes it clear it’s for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, it’s not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy settles into the couch by the fireside, the Lemmings come charging into the living room on their new mount, the vacuum cleaner. Irritated, the bear throws the mechanical charger into the fireplace, which blows up. Freezing air sweeps into the cabin. Seeking a source of heat, Grizzy decides to move into the science station greenhouse where the temperature is controlled by a drone. But the bear is unaware of what he carries in his luggage: the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a new playmate: a walrus! The rodents ride the creature throughout the cabin, then make him slide down the roof before starting all over again.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy goes fishing, the Lemmings jump on the opportunity to transform the cabin into a giant ice slide. Upon his return, the bear puts an end to the rodents bobsleigh party and gets ready to savor his days catch. But the Lemmings steal his fish and draw the bear outside the cabin. Grizzy must try to recover his lunch while protecting his territory from a rodent invasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pinches a magic statue from the Lemmings that has the power to make objects appear in real life. All you have to do, is pin the photo of ones desires upon it. Too bad for the rodents snow-bike! Grizzy replaces the vehicles photo with the portrait of his beloved she-bear who stayed behind in Canada. Barely arrived in African, the she-bear disappears again, victim of the rodents trickery. It is the outbreak of a bitter dispute.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin. The rodents land in the neighboring hut of a sorcerer and a mysterious mask falls onto one of them, endowing him with the power of telekinesis. The Lemmings are thrilled! They return to the cabin to explore this new magic power. Perched upon pieces of furniture, they fly around the room to finish their life-size flying train game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After another destructive bout of cat and mouse, Hildie and Beatie decide that Toms bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment! With a flick of the wand, Tom becomes a doting cat. Much better!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom is replaced by Meathead, Jerrys superior intelligence is no match for Meatheads dumb luck.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom to chases Jerry into the local Natural History Museum.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerrys investigation reveals some kitty criminals!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Like a big brother should, Jerry must get a sleepy Tuffy out of bed, make them both breakfast, get Tuffy cleaned up, put on his backpack and get him past the mean cat to the house next door.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom who chooses instead to use the mouses down time to taunt the little guy and eat all of his favorite treats. Jerry resorts to help from Uncle Pecos who, after trying a few Texas remedies, mixes a home brewed Texas tonic to knock the cold p-p-p-plum out. As a side effect of the Tabasco fueled brew, the mouse is breathing fire within minutes. When Tom catches the same cold and gets a dose of the brew, its an all-out flame war! Good thing Uncle Pecos is there to put the fire out!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Waffles is worried that his roommate Bo had his brain eaten by aliens, leaving him a zombie dog. Turns out hes not the first dog in his neighborhood to wake up stupid. Afraid of becoming the next Bo, Waffles hires the Cat and Mouse Detectives to put a stop to this alien invasion. Our Narrator thinks all of this extraterrestrial talk is a load of sci-fi hooey but not our detectives; theyre covering all their bases and taking every necessary precaution. Turns out the dogs behavior has more to do with a tainted bag of kibble than visitors from another planet… or does it?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks hes pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Toms wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick uploads a video of Tom getting his head stuck in Jerrys mouse hole, but the video goes viral, and Tom becomes a laughing stock.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem – but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part – and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. It’s chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. Can Bibi get free in time to unmask the imposter and save the day?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix, the Batwheels zoom into action to ensure the race is won the right way - fair and square !

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Green Arrow and his Arrowplane, Goldie, come to help Batman take on the Riddler. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around that she brings Goldie to life and the two become BFFs. But when Goldie eventually has to leave, Batwing learns that saying goodbye doesnt always mean forever!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batcaves cutest resident bat Alfie sneaks into Bam the Batmobile and causes adorable chaos during a mission to stop the Ducky Boat down at Gotham Docks.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When David insists on copying everything Liam does, Barney takes the kids on a trip to the Castle. They help Billy use his unique traits as a knight, leading David to the realization that its important to be your unique self.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: David doesnt want to play the same thing as everyone else, so the kids end up playing different games; when everything turns into chaos, David remembers that it is important to think about other peoples perspectives.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses insecticide and a fly swatter to get rid of vermin that are bothering him during his siesta. The Lemmings heal his last victim: a cute little insect they adopt as their house pet. Only problem, their starving mascot only eats wood! The cabin has lots of it, but when Grizzy realizes that an insect is eating his home from the inside, he takes drastic measures to eliminate it permanently.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is too hot and proposes the Lemmings an exchange: their ventilator, which they use to propel their skateboard in the air, for a baby ostrich Grizzy found outside the cabin and who can tow them. The Lemmings are delighted to play with their new baby friend who is overflowing with energy. But the baby’s parents have a different outlook and do not want their son taking risks. Thinking that Grizzy is the Lemmings’ father, they hold him accountable.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has played for too many hours on the console. His eyes are so fatigued he cannot stand a single ray of light. The Lemmings choose this very moment to throw a big birthday party with as many lights as possible! Grizzy goes to great lengths to settle the issue and decides to trip the power supply. The Lemmings discover a source of magical light deep in the savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings play Hide-n-Seek and cannot refrain from sabotaging their game by revealing their hiding places. The Lemmings challenge him to play against them. The two sides outdo each other in cunning and trickery, but they are equally good. For the last decisive round, the opponents decide to extend the game zone to the entire savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have organized a mega party at the cabin. This is obviously not to Grizzy’s liking and the bear throws them out. The Lemmings discover a cave where the party is even more fun, but their ruckus drives out the bats who seek refuge in the cabin. Terrified of them, Grizzy tries everything to get rid of them and understands that the most effective thing is the Lemmings’ ghetto blaster.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs the fridge to keep his fish cold, but the Lemmings want it to make ice for their miniature ice skating rink. When Grizzy finds a new model robot air conditioner that is both rapid and efficient, the problem seems to be solved: each party will have their own source of cold. But when the Lemmings activate the robot’s artificial intelligence, the gadget starts to feel a powerful love for the person who resembles him most in his new surroundings: the fridge. Grizzy and the Lemmings will do everything to break up this budding romance and recover the cold sources that are rightfully theirs.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is stuck in the lab with a dangerous robot on the loose! It’s up to the combined effort of the two Docs and the entire Lab team to save him before it is too late.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are on holiday and board a high-speed train only to realise that Lamput is also on the same train, except he’s in First Class! During the train journey, the Docs try to get from Coach into First Class but are refused entry by the train’s Captain. They then disguise themselves as train staff and finally get in, ready to capture the unsuspecting Lamput.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs and Lamput are excited because the FunFair is in town! But after the Docs cause havoc for the Carnival Clown during his juggling act, Lamput tries to make things right. The Clown is delighted in his new found friend and the two of them disappear into his House of Fun, with the Docs giving chase. But not all is as it seems inside the mysterious fun house, and the Docs have to come up with a cunning plan to capture Lamput and avoid upsetting the Clown any more!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean fears daft films about giant cats, blobs, and tiny dancing men. A trip to the cinema sends his imagination wild with hilarious, scary tricks.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy takes the Gang to the Minor League Baseball stadium of his youth only to learn that its about to be shut down because a Ghostly Baseball Player is scaring away the fans!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When an Artificial Intelligence takes over the building of a trendy tech company, the gang has to solve the computerized mystery - and maybe learn a lesson about relying too much on technology.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
