programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Maude tasks Tom with guarding her prize pumpkin until she enters it into competition at the county fair.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her...Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a science museum in the desert where Wile E. Coyote becomes distracted by the Road Runner.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Mayor Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a water wheel in the forest where Porky worries about a mythical creature named “Big Feet.”

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build Tibs Squirrel a closet in his tree, but it won’t fit all of Tibs’ stuff and he doesn’t want to get rid of anything.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders enter a sandcastle building contest, Tweety sees the competition and loses confidence in his idea.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Hector hires The Looney Builders to build him a burger restaurant, but Daffy is so focused on beating his handheld game that he causes major setbacks.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary. But as Batman and Bam pursue Harley, Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. Can Bibi get free in time to unmask the imposter and save the day?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix, the Batwheels zoom into action to ensure the race is won the right way - fair and square !

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Green Arrow and his Arrowplane, Goldie, come to help Batman take on the Riddler. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around that she brings Goldie to life and the two become BFFs. But when Goldie eventually has to leave, Batwing learns that saying goodbye doesnt always mean forever!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam when hes in a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her as a Batwheel - if he can convince her to stop playing long enough to focus on their mission!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: A music video introducing the villainous vehicle squad - The Legion of Zoom - introducing their shifty skills and pernicious personalities.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet can’t touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wicket’s garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divya’s driving skills so take the karts for a “proper” race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because he has won the moss-ball game last year, Puff is in charge of organizing this Summer’s Picnic. Only Puff isn’t comfortable in that role. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to help and make sure all the Mushables will follow Puff’s lead. Gradually, Puff gains confidence and ends up bossing everyone around. Now, all the Mushables are about to flee the Picnic!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit notice that Mushpie seems in great shape lately. They want to feel as great as she does and try to discover her secret.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chep asks Mush-Mush and Lilit to go storm-watching and they refuse, Lilit feels bad and convinces Mush-Mush to join their friend.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Fung and Miff have come across a rare piece of bark struck by lightning.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep knows so many things about nature that Mush-Mush and Lilit are confident he’s not far from being an expert like Mushpot.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has been watching Sushi-Mushi test new compost fritters recipes. When Mush-Mush gets to taste one, he can’t believe it: Sushi-Mushi has cooked the perfect fritter.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings... clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the ranger’s collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages a space station.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to try out the brand new packaging format of chocolate spread that he discovers in the rangers cupboard: a yummy-looking XXL jar. And he does not intend to share it with the Lemmings. After observing a chameleon toad that is able to blend into its surroundings, the Lemmings decide to make themselves invisible to attain Grizzys treasure.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities: one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzys split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After studying a magazine advertisement with a couple standing in front of an SUV Grizzy imagines that if only he had a nice car his favorite she-bear would be

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortune teller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesn’t have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises it’s a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesn’t go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesn’t have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he can’t remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine there’s only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Bean’s main concern is to get some money and get back to the baker’s before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own ‘No Littering’ signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentine’s Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irma’s attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a ‘date’ to the Valentine’s Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-teller’s prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep offers to look after the Golden Compost while Sushi-Mushi is away. But it smells so delicious that the Mushables will do anything to taste it. Its up to Chep to stop them!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chanterelle comes across something Mush-Mush has made, she declares him a genius artist! But Mush-Mush is not sure thats the kind of genius he wants to be.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Bolly can take a break and head off to have fun, our Mushlers insist that they will do all the repairs around Mushton for him. Now Bolly needs to fix all their repairs!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone realizes that they dont actually know what Fung and Miffs special gifts are! So Puff and our Mushlers set out to try and find out without Fung and Miff knowing.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has created a cloak out of a leaf, and Chanterelle thinks its super fashionable. But when she makes a similar cloak to Cheps, a fashion rivalry is born!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but it’s too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop… until he’s thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book – so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddy’s picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines – and soon enough, he’s been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like he’s cheating!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet – but it won’t appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but it’s useless – he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm – yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesn’t miss the comet…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctor’s outfit with stethoscope – great Teddy - I’ll give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking he’s a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before he’s found out?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create an irresistible rhythm on a set of magic drums and kick off a battle of the bands with Grizzy, who just wants a good nights sleep.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her...Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: De gang gaat naar een festival voor de Dag van de Doden. Daar komen ze erachter dat de geest van een oude legendarische crimineel, El Bandito, is teruggekeerd om de bevolking angst aan te jagen. Fred raakt geobsedeerd met het mysterie en wil onderdeel van de legende worden.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne agrees to watch her friends kid, Wayne, and convinces Fred to take a night off from mysteries to go to the boardwalk amusement park. Unbeknownst to her, though, the park is being haunted by a fiendish clown, Madcap.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Condiment King takes advantage of no Batwheels being on patrol to unleash a barrage of ketchup and mustard on an unsuspecting Gotham.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When David insists on copying everything Liam does, Barney takes the kids on a trip to the Castle. They help Billy use his unique traits as a knight, leading David to the realization that its important to be your unique self.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When a cold keeps David stuck inside, his friends get creative and play with him from outside his window. / When a blackout upends Vivies evening plans, Barney and the kids pivot to night time fun with help from the community.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Bean’s life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesn’t have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises it’s a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesn’t go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesn’t have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he can’t remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine there’s only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Bean’s main concern is to get some money and get back to the baker’s before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: It’s the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame we’ll never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil’ Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After the Docs constantly fail to catch Lamput with the power of science and technology, they come across an unlikely source to help them with their troubles - Magic! A witch offers them a magic marker that gives them any supernatural powers they draw on their skin. Lamput must now escape and Skinny with their new magical power!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its a night out at the theatre for the Docs but when they spot Lamput in the front row, they decide to give up their night of culture for a night of capture! Lamput escapes backstage where he morphs from scenery into props, then into costume and eventually ends up on stage! The Docs make chase, and end up becoming part of the performance too, much to the Directors dismay. Can the show go on? Or will it be a total flop?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to “gold leaf” the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that it’s his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements along with instructions. The idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or of ice, like in the game “Floor is Lava.” They transform the cabin into a giant adventure trail. Depending on the card drawn, they must avoid zones on the floor with flames or wax. Grizzy unceremoniously gets rids of the setup to regain control of the cabin. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava. The Lemmings are delighted: they will be able to play “for real”!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a very particular cocoa tree with chocolate-spread sap! Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past to equip themselves with all sorts of containers: ladles, soup spoons, bowls, buckets, basins, etc. He watches them through binoculars and discovers that they have planted a faucet in a tree where chocolate spread flows. Grizzy decides to siphon off their tree.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spikes bones are missing, and Frankie the Rat is the culprit. Now all they have to do is catch in the dirty rat in the act.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The detectives across the hall are responsible for a series of high profile thefts and are framing innocent people for the crimes.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Cat and Mouse are hired to find out who absconded with Hoops McJumpalots lucky high top sneakers.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Spike get glued together.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is placed in charge of caring for the Duchess French Poodle and needs Tuffy and Jerrys help in keeping the ill-tempered mutt under control.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Things get crazy down on the farm when a cat and mouse pursuit leads Jerry to hide his turtle egg in a hens nest.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After struggling to solve a riddle from Riddlers helicopter Quizz, Redbird must learn to speak up and share his ideas with the Batwheels. / After Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam from a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her as a Batwheel.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Legion of Zoom is tired of always losing. They decide to take a page from the Batwheels and try using teamwork in order to pull off a daring heist. But will they be able to work together?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Velmas got an interview at the prestigious Kingston University the most selective school in the country. The only catch? The dean wants her and the rest of the Scooby gang to figure out why the ghost of Elias Kingston the schools founder is haunting Kingstons book-filled halls!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brengt de gang mee naar een Victoriaans moordmysteriefeest, zodat ze zich mooi kunnen aankleden en een nepmysterie kunnen oplossen voor de verandering. Maar wanneer een onthoofde graaf (DAVID KAYE) daadwerkelijk mensen begint te ontvoeren, moet de gang boef pakken!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean receives a delivery of a bunch of flowers for Mrs Wicket, but accidentally runs them over in the his car. He can’t afford to replace them, so he decides to recreate the bunch by taking flowers one by one from anywhere he can - a vase in a cafe, a wedding bouquet, even from between the teeth of a tango dancer! But will he assemble the bunch and be back in time for Mrs Wicket?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwal’s new drone that he doesn’t notice a car thief stealing his car. They quickly jump into Mr Paliwal’s car and use the drone to track the stolen car to the thief’s warehouse hideout. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation – but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwal’s flying gadget?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints – pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but it’s too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists he’s an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy – the winner being the first to climb “The Big One”, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadn’t counted on the competitive dad’s dirty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When a Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year, he comes to Tom and Jerry claiming foul play. Its up to the duo to see whats really behind the most famous race in history.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn, a giant stuffed warlock and a piranha they won in the ball toss.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Wanting to cool off from the heat, Tom and Jerry use magic to make it snow, turning the witches world into a haunted wonderland with an evil snowman.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing, Tom is writing a novel. Its a mystery novel. Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebodys got to go.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its that special time of year when the Lady of the Houses rare, exotic (and very stinky) cheese gets delivered to the manor. Its up to Tom to make sure not a crumb of this cheese—known to be a favorite of mice—goes missing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger decides she wants to teach Tom to walk on a leash to ensure he gets much-needed exercise. Tom hates the leash and does not want to go for a walk. Finally, theyre on their way, much to Toms chagrin. Back home, Jerry and Tuffy proceed to raid the fridge.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger leaves some frozen fish on the kitchen counter to thaw. Ginger and Rick warn Tom to keep his paws away, or he will not get anything to eat. Soon, a live baby octopus crawls out of the mouth of one of the thawing fish and jumps off the counter, looking for a place to hide. Jerry befriends him and does his best to protect him from Tom.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: How does Mr Bean know Teddy? Could he drive a mini at the age of ten? How long has he known Mrs Wicket? Bean takes us on a journey into the past to answer these and many more questions.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam when hes in a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her as a Batwheel - if he can convince her to stop playing long enough to focus on their mission!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi wishes she could live a rule-free life like Jestah, so she decides to only focus on having fun instead. But when her actions put Batgirl in danger, Bibi must put the fun aside to stop Harley and save her hero.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give Buff the nickname "Tough Buff." But Buff abruptly bristles at the name, leading the Batwheels to realize that its not okay to call your friends nicknames that they dont like.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song! Theyll need to learn to harmonize as a team to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Tour the glittering night sky with Batwing, Gothams flying protector with a penchant for posing, as she dips, dives and dodges through buildings and water to take on villains and bail out a friend or two -- set to her funky-fresh theme song.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mel is in a pessimistic funk, Barney takes the kids on a trip to the Enchanted Forest to help an optimistic fairy with an injured wing. Mel learns how to adopt an optimistic mindset to overcome adversity and help the fairy.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mel breaks her arm, she’s away from the park while she recovers and her friends do something nice to show her how much they missed her. / Barney shows Mel the importance of not just respecting nature, but also being a caretaker of it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoo’s refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedia’s instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings’ hard rock concert is driving Grizzy mad. After kicking them out, Grizzy requisitions their ghetto blaster and listens to a relaxation cassette to calm down. The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree whose engraved strips of bark cast targeted maledictions. To recover their material, the Lemmings decide to drive Grizzy out by cursing him with the Ten Plaques of the Savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine, Grizzy decides to redo the cabin’s interior design. To make sure everything is perfect, he ousts the Lemmings and their electric train. By chance, the Lemmings discover an underground futuristic premises in the middle of the savanna. From this secret place, they can see the entire savanna on a giant screen, down to the very inside of Grizzy’s cabin just like in a sandbox video game. By using the menus, they can have an impact on reality and thus... on Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod. Grizzy steals their stick and finds a Yummy deposit in the savanna. To take control over Grizzy’s discovery, the Lemmings set a trap to draw the bear far from the deposit and transform it into an industrial chocolate factory. Grizzy will want to recover his chocolate deposit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An eclipse prevents the solar panels from supplying the cabin with electricity and Grizzy is disgruntledbecause he can’t watch TV. When he discovers that the Lemmings are using fireflies to have a party withoutelectricity, Grizzy evicts the Lemmings and recovers the fireflies to fuel the solar panels. The Lemmingshappen upon a jewel that gives them total control over the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings recover a jar of Yummy from an automatic distributor but before they can enjoy it Grizzy confiscates the treat. In exchange, he leaves them the keyring that came as a gift. The Lemmings aren’t interested until the keyring lands in a magic vial which gives it an extraordinary power: stick the keyring onto any object and it will shrink to the size of a plastic miniature figurine!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput, The Docs, The Thief and Droopy are all approaching the end of a typical day - the Docs are chasing Lamput, the thief has achieved the perfect gallery art heist and Droopy has finished his day at the office. But an unexpected collision causes confusion when their briefcases get muddled up and they each end up with each others belongings. Its’ not long before they find out about the mistake, but who has whose stuff? And how will they get it back?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursuit of Lamput takes them to the North Pole, where Lamput is taking photographs of arctic wildlife. The Docs decide to disguise themselves as various animals to get close to Lamput, only to be thwarted each time by the same animals they’re pretending to be, including a polar bear mother and her cub.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: A freak accident causes Lamput to grow giant in size! The two Docs must find a way to deal with this gargantuan problem and catch him roaming the big city!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Bean’s landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you cant even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Gang has seats on the largest airplane ever to fly the open airways! Unfortunately the plane is also beset by a Gremlin bent on sabotaging the flight! The Gang has to step up to solve the airborne mystery as well as deal with something even scarier: Daphne flying a plane!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When a rich man writes Scooby into his will, the gang must spend a night in his creepy mansion with kooky relatives and a spooky phantom to collect Scoobys share.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A battle for control erupts after a genie emerges from a lamp that Ginger brought home from a yard sale.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Cat and Mouse detectives are hired to track down Tuffys imaginary scapegoat, Mr. Nobody.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its the battle of the soldier angels when pranks run amok on April Fools Day.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom has trouble keeping track of a pinata full of stolen loot.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A knock on the head turns Tom into Quixote that leads him into battle with Butch over Toodles affections.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders help Petunia build a greenhouse, she can’t wait for the veggies to grow and does everything she can to speed up the process.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Marvin the Martian crash lands in Looneyburg, he’s in a hurry to leave and hires The Looney Builders to build him a spaceship.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build a doghouse on Mars for his puppy, K-9. Daffy soon bonds with K-9 and comes up with a plan to prolong their playtime.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Daffys cool cousin Billy hires The Looney Builders to build her an art studio, Daffy tries to show off to prove how cool he is.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Mouse Sisters hire The Looney Builders to build a cheese cafe featuring a mural by Sylvester who is having a bad day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi wishes she could live a rule-free life like Jestah, so she decides to only focus on having fun instead. But when her actions put Batgirl in danger, Bibi must put the fun aside to stop Harley and save her hero.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give Buff the nickname "Tough Buff." But Buff abruptly bristles at the name, leading the Batwheels to realize that its not okay to call your friends nicknames that they dont like.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song! Theyll need to learn to harmonize as a team to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave, unbeknownst to the rest of the Bat-Family.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Jestah injures herself preparing for an extreme sports competition with the other Zoomers, Bibi helps her overcome her fear of going to the mechanic so she can heal up in time to compete.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buffs trusty winch is knocked out of action by Poison Ivy, he must learn to improvise and come up with creative solutions on the fly.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Surf-riding musical mayhem with Batman, Robin, and the Batwheels!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush wants to impress the Mushlets by showing off his sensing gift. But his sense-foot doesn’t work like it should. This is a disaster! And when Mushpot explains that some Mushables have to wait until they become Mushups to see their gifts fully developed, Mush-Mush is frustrated. He wants to master his gift now! Mush-Mush discovers that the solution he’s looking for might be in The Dark Dark Forest. Mush-Mush decides to take his friends Chep and Lilit on a little trip...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers lead Sushi-Mushi to believe that Pickled Swampost is Mushpot’s favourite dish when he cant stand it. Now they must try to stop Sushi-Mushi from serving this horrible food to Mushpot!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is the only Mushable who cant bend a small branch back to catapult himself between two trees. He feels weak and embarrassed. But when strength doesnt work, Chep realizes that its all in the technique!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: It seems like Starmush is the only one who can answer Mush-Mushs difficult questions. But Starmush lives so far away in the Dark Forest! Mush-Mush hatches a plan to get Starmush to move to Mushton, so he can get answers right here at home.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit remembers loving balancing on a slack-vine when she was a Mushlet. But actually, she never really learnt how, so she keeps falling off and getting really frustrated.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing "beach party" inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy, who wishes to recover his couch, tries to straighten up, but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate, Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine... frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with, whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: it’s been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself, before selecting the appropriate foodstuffs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer to the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy, the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones, and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine, but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one that’s perfect but is outraged when he’s told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers he’s one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find it’s closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his ‘princess’. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: Uncertainty around U.S. policy is pushing businesses, investors, and governments to rethink long-standing relationships. Rising protectionism is accelerating a shift towards new trade corridors linking the Gulf with China, India, Africa, and within the region itself. At the same time, global capital is on the move. From Wall Street to Riyadh, investors are contending with higher interest rates and fragmented markets, while the Gulf positions itself as both a magnet for international capital and a launchpad for record-breaking IPOs.

programme.desc: Many cities around the world dedicate insane amounts of space to parking. programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Saatuaan hammaskeijulta viiden dollarin setelin, Bluey on innoissaan menossa Isan kanssa kauppoihin kayttamaan rahansa! Mutta tutkiessaan kauppojen hyllyja ystavansa Indyn kanssa, on yha vaikeampi ostaa jotain. Kun tarjolla on kaikkea hevoskyydeista pannukakkuihin, on vaikea valita! Paniikinomaisen herateostoksen johdosta Bluey harmittelee, ettei voi ostaa laulua katusoittajalta. Indyn vakuuttelu, etta ”sen minka taakseen jattaa, edestaan loytaa” pitaa paikkansa kun viiden dollarin seteli matkaa ympari kauppaa ja Bluey saa uuden mahdollisuuden.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: "Maahommik" randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just "Maahommiku" saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Viimasel ajal on Soomaa veisekasvatajad olnud hadas sagenenud hundirunnakutega. Nuud on Keskkonnaamet valjastanud nuhtlusisendite kuttimiseks eriload, mille alusel saavad jahimehed lasta hunte ka sealsel looduskaitsealal. Uurime, milline on inimese roll selles konfliktis ja mis võiks olla lahenduseks. Tallinna loomaaia ninasarvik Elbat kimbutas hiljuti tõsine tervisemure, mistõttu loom kahjuks suri. Jalgisime loomaarstide tood, kui puuti selle võimsa looma tervisehada põhjust leida. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: "Maahommik" toob ekraanile arksad ideed, tegusad inimesed ja huvitavad ettevõtmised.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Feliciano paljastab teenijatele Petra saladuse. María otsustab tundeid avaldada. Markii ei mõista autojuhi hilinemist. Janal ja Manuelil on raske distantsi hoida.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Jari poeg Santeri tuleb EMOsse praktikale ja Jari uritab teda oma kaitsva tiiva alla võtta. Taina juhtum paneb Ilmarit mõtlema arstiameti piiride ule. Haiglasse toodud tõkkejooksja Kaisu sumptomid tekitavad kusimusi.

programme.title: Eesti lood
programme.desc: Film kadunud aegade saatkonnast, rõivaparandusarist Nõmmel, mis tootab jarjekindlalt, vaatamata kiirmoe võidukaigule meie turbulentses tarbimisuhiskonnas, kus on odavam osta uued riided, kui neid parandada lasta. See on atmosfaariline galerii uhest vanast, aga samas vagagi ajakohasest eluviisist ja muidugi vaga elusatest karakteritest selle keskel. Proua Ulve, proua Kulli, harra Arnold ja nende rohkem või vahem eriskummalised kliendid oma parandamist vajavate rõivastega on tegelased selles elukomoodias. Stsenarist ja režissoor Jaak Kilmi, operaatorid Kullar Viimne, Taavi Arus, monteerijad Jette Keedus, Jaak Kilmi, heli Tanel Roovik, produtsent Jaak Kilmi. Tootja Pimik OÜ.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Martin kutsutakse haige farmeri juurde, kuid too ei taha lambaid uksi jatta ega voodisse heita. Stewart kutsub Martini ja Ali ellujaamislaagrisse, kuhu laheb ka Penhale. Stewarti vaimne seisund aratab kahtlusi. Portwenni inimeste paeval selgub, et pool kooli on saanud Pippa aiast seennakkuse.

programme.title: Vello Salo. Igapaevaelu mustika
programme.desc: Vello Salol on omad kiiksud ja vigurid, elukogemust ning avarat vaimu, tarkust, mida ta on kogunud ja hoidnud, meie aega valja vedanud. Peale Eestist lahkumist 1944. aastal randas Salo labi terve maailma: oli sõdurina Soomes ja aednikuna Roomas, õppis Šveitsis ning Hollandis matemaatikat ja fuusikat ning Itaalias teoloogiat, Saksamaal puhitseti ta aga preestriks. Nii on ta õpetanud ja tootanud Itaalias, Iisraelis, Iraagis, Jordaanias, Kanadas, Rootsis ja mujalgi. Alates 1993. aastast on ta tagasi Eestis, katoliku preester Pirita kloostris. Inimese vaimuelu tippvorm saabub ikka alles vanemas eas. Nii mõnedki olulised kusimused saavad selgeks labi valu ja vaeva, alles paris viimases peatukis. Režissoor ja produtsent Jaan Tootsen, tootja Aadam ja Pojad. Film valmis Eesti Filmi Instituudi, Eesti Kultuurkapitali ja Eesti Rahvusringhaalingu toetusel. Tana on Vello Salo 95. sunniaastapaev.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Kulas puhkeb salmonelloos, mille tekitamises kahtlustatakse Aidensfieldi pubi kanapirukat. Kaks kurjategijat võtavad ema ja poja pantvangi. Vernoni uueks ariplaaniks on lemmikloomade surnuaed.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Mare ja Ülo raagivad elu rasketest õppetundidest. Allan ja Jaanus arutlevad tuleviku ule. Morna linnapea, Põder ja Margna sõlmivad vaherahu. Are tuleb andeks paluma. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Tahelepanu! Tegemist on teadusega
programme.desc: Eesti teadlased teevad iga paev avastusi, mis aitavad muuta meie tulevikku targemaks, turvalisemaks ja põnevamaks. Klipisari viib vaataja laboritesse ja katsevaljakutele, kus sunnivad ullatuslikud ideed ning avanevad teadusmaailma salaparased telgitagused. Režissoor Maarika Lauri, toimetaja Marit Ummelas.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: Kaheosaline dokumentaal, mis jutustab, kuidas nõukogude ajal Eesti NSV naiste murdmaakoondise juures alustanud usinast ja uuenduslikust eesti treenerist sai rahvusvahelise murdmaasuusatamise uks mõjukam ning tuntum spetsialist, kes tõstis sportlasi olumpiapjedestaalidele, aga havitas ka karjaare. Ta palvis tunnustust, auhindu ja kiitust, aga pettis samal ajal keeruliste kombinatsioonidega dopingukontrolle, sponsoreid ning spordisõpru. "Mati Alaver - valgusest varju" on traagiline lugu poorasest vaimustusest ja rangast pettumusest, mille telgitagustes peitub palju pooltoone ning fakte, mida uldsus esimest korda kuuleb. Autor-stsenarist Mihkel Karmas, režissoorid Raivo Maripuu, Vladlen Pobjaržin, toimetajad Kristjan Pihl, Taavi Eilat, Merilin Parli, Uljana Kuzmina, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kõigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kõik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema.

programme.title: Maire Aunaste. Liiga eriline?
programme.desc: Vahur Kersna vestlus Eesti labi aegade tõenaoliselt uhe kõige saravama, andekama, emotsionaalsema, tundesiirama ja ausama naisajakirjanikuga. Režissoor Margus Aasna, produtsent Ruth Heinmaa. 7. novembril on Maire Aunastel 71. sunnipaev. Palju õnne!

programme.title: Pea ees vette. Tai Kuningriigis
programme.desc: Sarja seekordne osa viib Pireti, Egerti ja Milli tagasi Taimaa pulbitsevasse pealinna Bangkokki. Seal ootab ees rõõmus kohtumine Eesti vutiassa Henri Anieriga, kelle uus koduklubi on Tai kõrgliigas mangiv Muangthong United. Sel korral jõuavad Milderid aga ka Tai Kuningriigi kõige ilusamasse punkti ehk Phi Phi saartele. Režissoor Egert Milder, toimetaja Piret Jarvis-Milder. Tootja Kaks Vulkaani.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Kulas puhkeb salmonelloos, mille tekitamises kahtlustatakse Aidensfieldi pubi kanapirukat. Kaks kurjategijat võtavad ema ja poja pantvangi. Vernoni uueks ariplaaniks on lemmikloomade surnuaed.

programme.title: Lint
programme.desc: Kiirekskursioon ETV arhiivides jatkub. Seekordses saates on vaatluse all kuuekumnendate ja seitsmekumnendate aastate meelelahutustoostus.

programme.desc: In North Dakota, Guy visits a bakery cafe that makes sticky pecan rolls from scratch. And, he stops by a market-butcher eatery in South Dakota.

programme.desc: Four chefs have a lot of ideas for mixing turkey legs with milkshakes before rushing to make steak work with a wacky candied surprise.

programme.desc: Ree Drummond celebrates the opening of her new sweet shop. For the occasions, she makes an incredible jewelled divinity and two over-the-top ice cream sundaes.

programme.desc: Chef Carla Hall tries to beat TV announcer Steve Higgins in the kitchen. They are assisted by Kathy Sidell and Vinson Petrillo, who will take on Bobby Flay?

programme.desc: The star ingredient is tricky for the competitors, will they keep their recipes simple? Scott Conant and Cheri Oteri pick the chef to take on Bobby.

programme.desc: The bakers face decay when host John Henson challenges them to make moldy desserts that incorporate fermented ingredients. Then, judges Carla Hall, Zac Young and Stephanie Boswell smash desserts and dreams as they send one baker up to the 13th floor.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Three champions are determined to defeat judge Alex Guarnaschelli. They are challenged to create a dish using rainbow soup dumplings and cheddar cheese sauce.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman

programme.desc: Ree Drummond recreates a Tex-Mex dish from a friends engagement party. She makes crispy cerveza battered fish and prickly pear margaritas.

programme.desc: Selena Gomez steps up her game in Stephanie Izards kitchen. For her special, Selena makes a ricotta toast inspired by cheese and crackers.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena Gomez and Shirley Chung create a fusion version of a childhood favourite. Later, Selena tries to make a dish good enough for the Ms Chis menu.

programme.desc: Guy Fieri has a sandwich extravaganza with awesome brisket au jus in Indianapolis, tender barbacoa in California and pastrami pizza in San Antonio.

programme.desc: The competitors flaunt their artistic flair with works of candy art. The three finalists construct macaron towers for guest judge Leanne Pietrasinski.

programme.desc: Ree Drummond is in the mood to create show-stopping pies. She shares a fantastical waffle cone ice cream pie and a decadent double chocolate pie.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena Gomez feels the pressure at Alta, Keith Corbins California restaurant. Later, she makes a fried fish dish for Atlas toughest critic, Renee Corbin.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena Gomez tries the best Texas BBQ in Los Angeles at Moos Craft Barbecue. Then, Selena puts her own spin on their meat-centric menu.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Scott Conant and Damaris Phillips pull out all the stops, including a dance number, to help contenders Hari Pulapaka and Denis Radovic finish big against Bobby Flay.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Actress, and comedian Aisha Tyler and Katie Lee Biegel ply Bobby Flay with cocktails while Jeff Potts and Brittney Williams toast their path to victory.

programme.title: Halloween Cake-Off
programme.desc: The bakers make cakes that have become decayed, using fermented ingredients like sauerkraut. The finalists create masterpieces that rot before the judges eyes!

programme.title: Bakers Dozen
programme.desc: Competing bakers decorate giant cupcakes to look like succulents. And guest judge Rachael Teufel challenges the final three to make an illusion cake.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: John Henson turns up the heat when he asks the seven remaining bakers to set their desserts on fire by reinventing flambe classics. Then, the bakers have judges Stephanie Bowell, Zac Young and Carla Hall in stitches with realistic open wound cakes.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Damaris Phillips and TV host Jaymee Sire hope to strike a victorious chord against Bobby Flay. Will they pick a French chef or a Philadelphia native?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Scott Conant and Vivica A. Fox pick the competitor to take on Bobby Flay. Will it be the French master or the Caribbean cuisine enthusiast?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri checks out a Florida sandwich shop with a taste of Peru and a pierogi palace in Philadelphia. And a North Dakota pizza joint serves up meatballs.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four chefs face issues of confidence and competence as they focus on the fabulous food of Tuscany in all its fresh, humble glory.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert visits Park Vue Soul Food Bar and Restaurant in Buffalo, where an inexperienced mother-daughter team is desperately trying to serve their community.

programme.title: Battle Of The Decades
programme.desc: The chefs use beloved foods from 1984 and a toy oven to create elevated dishes. Then, they tackle birria pizza and their own baked Alaska.

programme.title: Alex Vs. America
programme.desc: Tournament of Champions winners Antonia Lofaso, Tiffani Faison and Mei Lin take on Alex Guarnaschelli in a battle for the ages.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: John Henson turns the bakers worlds upside down with a challenge to make upside-down cakes without pineapple. Then, judges Carla Hall, Zac Young and Stephanie Boswell see double when the bakers team up to create identical twin cakes that taste different.

programme.title: Battle Of The Decades
programme.desc: The chefs use Taylor Daynes memories of 1988 to create unique dishes. Then, they serve up their own version of Gigi Hadids viral pasta.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Three chefs compete for a chance to take on judge Tiffani Faison. In the first round, they must cook a dish using carrot cake soda and water spinach.

Innokkailla tekijoilla on jonkin verran taitoja, mutta sitakin suurempi halu tehda voittoa kauppaamalla remontoidut kohteet eteenpain.

programme.title: Remonttipari
programme.desc: Chip ja Joanna Gaines pyorittavat Wacossa, Teksasissa talojen uudistamiseen ja sisustamiseen erikoistunutta Magnolia Homes-yritystaan. Sarjassa seurataan, kuinka rakentamisesta vastaava Chip ja sisustamiseen keskittyva Joanna muokkaavat rapistuneita, mutta runsaasti potentiaalia omaavia taloja edustuskuntoon. Samalla kohenee koko asuinalueen ilme.
